Text:
My upload speed really sucks, so help me out here, ppl - let this puppy seed for awhile after you get it - please.

And, does anyone have artwork for it?  I'd love to have a hi-rez scan of the original VHS box.

Thank you!
Saw this movie when I was really little and almost thought I was dreaming it up because no one else seemed to remember it.....hey...what's that movie with the buffalo??? Nothing Nothing.....finally I figured it out thanks to yahoo answers and youtube.  Then, it's only on VHS and it's rare...so here I am!  Thanks for this!  Looking forward to watching it!

"Bless the Beasts and Children" is among my most favorite movies. 
Thank you very much for the upload. As I value the film, I'll try to seed it as much as possible.
